products.product_name: Stroller Pram Reversible Handle for baby
products.description: Stroller Pram with Reversible Extendable Handle Bar lets your baby sit comfortably and feel safe to experience new sounds, movements, colours and shapes around the world. Perfection to follow the highest safety standards, comforting rhythmic motion experienced by the baby being in Stroller. Its sky view high ground clearance gives the baby enjoyable ride. Feather soft double cushioning seat for that extra pampering for the baby. Reversible Handle and underneath is a safety Storage Box within the Storage Basket. Steel ball bearings to make the ride jerk free with double shock absorption spring system. Detachable food try, bottle holder . Perfection and luxury to the next level.Rolling vechicle for baby
